trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Sydney
There were no other sightings in Sydney on or around July 7th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsi went out on my back patio deck with my wife my daughter and nephew at around 1010pm i seen the first object flying towards my house maby 25000 ft in hight ,through my binauculars the objects looked disc shaped which my nephew also confirmed their was no noise at all and i have to mention commercial planes fly over alought so i know the differance plus these objects were one solid color the second object got really bright several times i scan the sky's every chance i get and i can tell you they deffinately were not any conventional planes the sightings lasted untill they went out of view about 2 minutes after they were out of sight three large planes flew over they sounded louder than the commercial planes do but with all the exitement i couldnt say for sure they were military but it certainly seemed weird that they would fly by right after these objects did they were travelling at a steady pace changed direction slightly to the right and headed in the direction of port morion if you were to draw a straight line, over the last four to five years i have seen several very interesting objects the very best were a kind a chevron shaped object which looked semi transparent almost like the colors were moving around constantly because you could see the night sky in between the color which was a pinkish red the left wing tilted downwards then it straightened out then the right wing tilted then it started to accelerate very quickly i reported that sighting to brian vike's web site if it's archived their the report would have more than i can remember now,another night when i got home from work around 11:15pm i went out for a smoke and while i was standing on the side of my house talking on the phone i commented on how dark and clear the night was to my friend who got me interested in ufo watching anyway when i turned my head to the left i seen a very bright amber orange light flying towards me so i ran in the house and went to the back patio where i watched this object fly by very slowly at first then it started to accelerate and climbed very quickly in altitude on what looked like at least a 65%incline until it went out of site those to sightings happened approximately 2 years ago that sighting was also sent to brian vike,so that's it their seems to be a fair amount of activity in this area and i thought it would be nice to share it thank you.
Summary: 2 objects app 1 to 2 mins apart same direction followed by three large planes.
